DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to explore the connection between gait variability parameters and balance performance in children with physical disability
DOC.brief_title: The Connection Between Gait Variability Parameters and Balance Performance in Children With Physical Disability
DOC.detailed_description: Step length and step time variability will be measured with an electronic walkway, strength of 4 lower-extremity muscle groups will be tested bilaterally with a hand held dynamometer, walking performance as will be assessed by the 2 minute walk test, energy expenditure index (EEI) and rating of perceived exertion (OMNI scale).
DOC.criteria: 3 years of age and older Ambulate, with or without an aid
